snippet.title: Christian Benitez died of heart failure, Qatari club says
snippet.description: Funeral for star player will be held Thusday in Ecuador.

snippet.title: In Keegan's 'Behanding in Spokane,' the twisted turns tedious
snippet.description: Martin McDonagh's deadpan wit and slickly plotted sensationalism in this grisly comic play.

snippet.title: All bard, no blarney
snippet.description: Maestro of the English language? Connoisseur of prose? Irish playwright Enda Walsh dismisses the praise, but his work has earned enough admiration for Studio Theatre to undertake an ambitious survey of "Penelope," "The New Electric Ballroom" and "The Walworth Farce."
